Package model

Class StockCompositionDataImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.StockCompositionDataImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockCompositionData, StockPortFolioData
    public class StockCompositionDataImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockCompositionData
    This class represents the stock composition data and methods that can be called upon to get the data related to the stocks. This method has the following variables.
    • numberOfPortFolio - the number of portfolio that are available in the system

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StockCompositionDataImpl​(java.lang.String portfolioType)
      A constructor that reads the user directory to find the number of portfolios that the user has or created and assigns the number to the global variable.

                                                         boolean includeSale,
                                                         boolean realValue,
                                                         java.lang.String portfolioType)
        Description copied from interface: StockCompositionData
        This method gets all the stock related data that is in a portfolio and some data relevant to the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        getAllStockDataInPortFolio in interface StockCompositionData
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the portfolio
        unique - true if the stocks bought of different dates should be obtained uniquely
        dateStr - date until which the stock data is required
        includeSale - true if the data needs to have the stocks that are sold as well
        realValue - true to ignore the data of those stocks with zero shares
        portfolioType - type of portfolio
        Returns:
        the object of stock portfolio data class
